description: The driver was threatened before 27 pallets of e-cigarettes were stolen from inside the lorry.
title: Hundreds of e-cigarettes stolen in raid on lorry
title_page: Hundreds of e-cigarettes stolen in raid on lorry near Annan - BBC News
maintext:
Hundreds of e-cigarettes have been stolen from a lorry parked in a layby in Dumfries and Galloway.
A group of men threatened the driver of the vehicle as it was stopped on the A75 between the B7020 and B721 near to the Annan West junction at about 22:45 on Thursday.
The men forced open the lorry before taking 27 pallets of e-cigarettes from inside.
